about.summary: An implementation of popular evaluation metrics that are commonly used in survival prediction including Concordance Index, Brier Score, Integrated Brier Score, Integrated Square Error, Integrated Absolute Error and Mean Absolute Error. For a detailed information, see (Ishwaran H, Kogalur UB, Blackstone EH and Lauer MS (2008) <doi:10.1214/08-AOAS169>) and (Moradian H, Larocque D and Bellavance F (2017) <doi:10.1007/s10985-016-9372-1>) for different evaluation metrics.

An implementation of popular evaluation metrics that are commonly used in survival prediction including Concordance Index, Brier Score, Integrated Brier Score, Integrated Square Error, Integrated Absolute Error and Mean Absolute Error. For a detailed information, see (Ishwaran H, Kogalur UB, Blackstone EH and Lauer MS (2008) <doi:10.1214/08-AOAS169>) and (Moradian H, Larocque D and Bellavance F (2017) <doi:10.1007/s10985-016-9372-1>) for different evaluation metrics.

name: r-survmetrics
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-survmetrics
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/SurvMetrics_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/SurvMetrics/SurvMetrics_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f12c6708d87be80fc303eb5c37cdf14778c671b60868a2282e9c8f091ede1792

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-pec
    - r-randomforestsrc
    - r-survival
    - r-survminer
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-pec
    - r-randomforestsrc
    - r-survival
    - r-survminer

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('SurvMetrics')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('SurvMetrics')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/skyee1/SurvMetrics
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: An implementation of popular evaluation metrics that are commonly used in survival prediction including Concordance Index, Brier Score, Integrated Brier Score, Integrated Square Error, Integrated Absolute Error and Mean Absolute Error. For a detailed information, see (Ishwaran H, Kogalur UB, Blackstone EH and
    Lauer MS (2008) <doi:10.1214/08-AOAS169>) and (Moradian H, Larocque D and Bellavance F (2017) <doi:10.1007/s10985-016-9372-1>) for different evaluation metrics.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
